meanings.definition: The rising of the earth above the horizon of the moon as seen from a spacecraft.
meanings.sent1: During the space mission, the astronauts were mesmerized by the earthrise from the moon.
meanings.sent2: The breathtaking earthrise captured by the camera was truly awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent3: The aliens on the moon were amazed by the earthrise and thought it was a giant cosmic pancake flipping over.
meanings.sent4: The earthrise was like a gentle giant waking up from its slumber in the vastness of space.
meanings.sent5: The vivid colors of the earthrise painted the moon's horizon with beauty and wonder.

meanings.definition: A photograph or image showing the earth rising above the horizon of the moon.
meanings.sent1: The astronaut proudly displayed the earthrise photo taken during the mission.
meanings.sent2: The magazine cover featured a stunning earthrise image that captivated readers.
meanings.sent3: The earthrise picture was so clear, it looked like a tiny earth-shaped balloon floating in space.
meanings.sent4: The earthrise photo symbolized the unity and fragility of our planet in the vast universe.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the earthrise image brought a sense of peace and perspective to all who saw it.
